ai-tha-ap447:2.1_0: But in this life it may be used
ai-tha-ap447:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap447:2.4_0: I’ve been born in the awakening.
ai-tha-ap447:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap447:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap447:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Uttarā.
ai-tha-ap447:7.1_0: and a senior mendicant with flowers.
